txt.en: A roar cuts through the air!
While searching for Gúrayin in Lower Lebennin's forest, you came across some dwarf-sized footprints. You should continue to follow the footprints and look for signs of Gúrayin.
A tattered piece of fabric flutters in the chill wind
These dwarf-sized bootprints lead north
Malbír has asked you to look for signs of his missing friend, Gúrayin, who was last seen heading north of Zarsatrâd.
At the foot of the snowy peaks of northern Lower Lebennin, rumours of a terrifying beast haunting the woods have emerged to coincide with news of a hunter gone missing.
Search for Gúrayin

As you leaned in to examine the scrap of blue fabric, a terrible beast roared and rushed forward to attack! You are sure that Gúrayin did not survive their encounter with the snow-beast. You should let Malbír know what you found.\n\nMalbír is at Zarsatrâd.
These dwarf-sized bootprints lead north

'Greetings, stranger. Tell me, have you seen my friend, Gúrayin, on your travels? No? Ah, more's the pity. I am quite worried about him. He went hunting yesterday and has not yet returned. No one else is concerned, but I swear I saw an enormous beast in the woods north of here and I am worried.\n\n'Will you keep your eyes open for any sign of my friend? I would greatly appreciate it! You will know him by his blue cloak!'
You found footprints!
At the foot of a snowy mountainside you found a scrap of blue fabric. You should investigate the fabric.\n\nThe fabric is in Lower Lebennin, north of Zarsatrâd.
These dwarf-sized bootprints lead north
On the Trail of Gúrayin

'Your grave expression tells me that you have no good news to share.'

You explain what happened to Gúrayin.

'I… thank you. I hope his end was a swift one, and I am grateful you have avenged him. No more of my friends will fall to that beast, and we have you to thank.'
'Greetings, stranger. Tell me, have you seen my friend, Gúrayin, on your travels?'
'Your grave expression tells me that you have no good news to share.'
This scrap of blue fabric is stained with blood and grime. You fear Gúrayin met an untimely fate at the claws of the snow-beasts.
Investigate the fabric scrap
Continue searching for Gúrayin
Return to Malbír
